order_code.description: The numeric order code for the order (e.g. 7051, 7093)

request_type.description: Specifies whether to add or remove quantity from the order

quantity.description: The amount to add or remove from the current order, in cubic meters (mÂ³)

function.description: Adjusts the quantity of an existing order by adding or removing cubic meters of material.

steps.title: Ask for Order Code
steps.action: Ask the caller for their Order Code (e.g. 7051, 7093)

steps.title: Determine Request Type
steps.action: Ask the caller if they want to add to or reduce their order quantity, and assign 'add_quantity' or 'remove_quantity' to the request_type field accordingly

steps.title: Collect Quantity
steps.action: Ask how many cubic meters they want to add or remove from their order

steps.title: Confirm Details
steps.action: Confirm all details with the caller before proceeding with the edit

conversation_steps.title: Edit Order Quantity
conversation_steps.description: Gather information from the caller to modify their order by adding or removing quantity in cubic meters.
